name: Decode, Disassemble & Decompile
description: Decode APK resources from resources.arsc, Disassemble classes*.dex to Smali and Decompile to Java [uses Apktool & Jadx]

name: Malware Analysis Report
description: Deep integration with Quark-Engine enables APKLab to give a detailed Malware Analysis report with ability to interact with problematic source code

name: Bypass Certificate Pinning
description: One-click patch for popular Certificate Pinning techniques to allow HTTPS traffic inspection with MITM proxies such as mitmproxy [uses apk-mitm]

name: Browse Smali like a PRO
description: With Smalise integration, you get features like Syntax-Highlighting, Goto definition/references, Rename symbol, etc. out of the box

name: ReBuild, Sign and Install
description: Rebuild APK from modified Smali sources & resources, seamlessly re-sign it and install over ADB directly from VS Code [uses Apktool & uber-apk-signer]

name: And much more...
description: Make APK Debuggable, Sign with a custom certificate, Download & configure .jar dependencies automatically, Initialize git in project dir to easily track changes, Manage res frameworks..
